name: Cargills ESL Home Learning,Six in the Bed
description: Bada, Abby, Mimi, Pogo, Curly, and Jess characters falls out per page. Children will be able to count backward from 6. While enjoying the story, kids are helped with speech development, and to develop a basic math skill to understand the size of a number in relation to other numbers.*Images for illustration purpose only, Product received may vary.
